content.title: TOS Conservative Treatment
content.definition: Physical therapy, postural training, muscle relaxants for neurogenic TOS. 60-70% improve with conservative care.
content.statement: TOS Conservative Treatment is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Thoracic-Outlet-Syndrome that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding TOS Conservative Treatment helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of TOS Conservative Treatment include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of TOS Conservative Treatment.

clinical_pearls: Key point about TOS Conservative Treatment
